decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (AL(0)01 Rev: 1, dated 14/10/13, received 15/10/13; AL(0)05, dated July 2013, received 07/08/13; AL(0)06 Rev: 2, dated 14/10/13, received 15/10/13; AL(0)07 Rev: 4, dated 14/10/13, received 15/10/13; AL(0)09 Rev: 1, dated 14/10/13, received 15/10/13; and Design & Access Statement, dated 14/10/13, received 15/10/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the openings to the rear of site and the roller shut to the front of the site, hereby permitted, shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - One month from the completion of the plant enclosure hereby approved, all other existing plant and enclosures to the front of Unit 5 will be removed and the area restored to use as car parking.

Condition : 5 - When the premises cease to be occupied by Virgin Media or at the end of 25 years from the date of this permission, whichever shall first occur, the equipment, machinery and enclosure hereby permitted shall be removed and the land upon which it is sited shall be returned to its current use as access to Unit 6.
description: Erection of external air conditioning plant and associated enclosure to the front of Unit 6, replacement of existing roller shutter to Unit 5, and new louvered ventilation to the rear of Units 5 and 6
